step_of_the_day.title:
Quantum physics tells us that observation, focus, and attention turn possibility into reality. Today
            determine what you want, focus on it and its possibility (Pillar #3)
step_of_the_day.content:
Quantum physics has been with us for over 100 years, yet in many respects it’s still a mystery. It’s still a
            concept that is difficult to grasp. One of the main core research findings is that on the microscopic level,
            the physical Universe only comes into being upon observation. Until there is the observation, there are only
            possibilities. What does this say for how to live your life?It tells me that if I don’t think something is possible – or I focus on how it is not possible – I won’t
            bring it into reality. On the other hand, if I do focus on the possibility of what I want - to happen – my
            focus then facilitates bringing it into reality.

action_step:
What do you want to bring into reality? Decide to focus on how it can happen, how it can be possible. Make
            this the focus of your day today – and then take steps on The Path in this direction.
journal_entry: Write about what you want and how you see it happening.
